class_notes:
(Same as BIOL 460 1)
Explores our current understanding of the mechanisms that regulate development of the nervous system. Topics covered include neurogenesis, axon guidance, programmed cell death, and synapse formation.  Prerequisites:  Biology 142 + 142L (or BIOL_OX 142) or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite.

prerequisites: (BIOL 142 and BIOL 142L) or BIOL_OX 142WE or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite.
